In accordance with Administrative Order 2009-1 signed August 04, 2009 by Chief Judge M. Bruce McCullough, this case will be transferred to Judge Thomas P. Agresti on September 22, 2009. At that time, Judge Thomas P. Agresti will be added to the case, and the involvement of Judge Warren W. Bentz will be terminated. It is recommended that Counsel review Judge Agresti's practices and procedures as set forth on the Court's website, www.pawb.uscourts.gov, which is updated from time-to-time, so as to familiarize Counsel with applicable procedures upon transfer of the Erie cases to Judge Agresti (jmar) (Entered: 08/26/2009)
